text: Umagiliya Durage Upul Chandana (born May 7, 1972 in Galle , Sri Lanka ) is a former Sri Lankan international cricketer. He made his ODI debut in 1994 at the age of 21. He made it to the team as a leg spinner. He is considered as one of the best legspinners in Sri Lanka. He retired from international cricket on 15 October 2007. == References == Category:1972 births Category:Living people Category:Sri Lankan cricketers
title: Upul Chandana
